description: the search iteration to a particular resource
state the engine or resource queried such as The Web of Science
list refinements applied to queries such as restrictions to years or publication types
list terms and boolean operators used in full here

tally the narrative reviews, idea papers, all synthesis contributions that did not formally report quantitative estimates from the literature or provide a replicable workflow to repeat queries of literature
tally the reviews that were listed as systematic and provided a mechanism to reproduce the search process
tally the meta-analyses that calculated and reported effect size estimates
tally the total number of primary studies, even coarsely, to estimate extent of study
